snippet: A bipartisan Senate coalition blocked a Democratic proposal to retroactively cut interest rates on higher education loans in half, leaving any student loan rescue in doubt.
abstract: Bipartisan Senate coalition blocks Democratic proposal to retroactively cut interest rates on higher education loans in half, leaving any student loan rescue in doubt and laying bare divisions among Democrats about how to resolve the dispute.
lead_paragraph: A bipartisan Senate coalition blocked a Democratic proposal to retroactively cut interest rates on higher education loans in half, leaving any student loan rescue in doubt.

headline.main: Rift Among Democrats Stalls Effort to Reverse Rise in College Loan Rates
headline.print_headline: Rift Among Democrats Stalls Effort to Reverse Rise in College Loan Rates
